attributes.review: This app is terrible. It glitches 24/7, it has been hacked, it steals your money and it gets your bank account access. It stole my McDonalds money! They even stole my great grandmas brand new puppy! Downloading this app will give you STD’s!!!👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

attributes.review: Trump supporters!!! this is not the real trump app, it is owned by communist China. They use this to try and promote the liberal agenda and sell your data to ISIS. Please delete as fast as possible and leave negative reviews so we can protect everyone’s data!!!!

attributes.review: when i downloaded this app it said “cannot be downloaded because all apps matter and we can’t just focus on this apps software” when i finally got it to work it came to my house and threw my baby out of my window. it then took all the food out of my fridge and put it in the toilet. then it lit my house on fire and killed me and my family. :).
